alert.note: Alert for Buckeye, Avondale; North Phoenix, Glendale; Northwest Valley; Sonoran Desert Natl Monument; Tonopah Desert (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 16 at 8:01PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Maricopa and Pinal Counties through 845 PM MST... At 800 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Youngtown to Cashion to near Phoenix International Raceway. Movement was west at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Glendale, Surprise, Avondale, Goodyear, Buckeye, El Mirage, Tolleson, Youngtown, Waddell, Cashion, Sun City, Litchfield Park, Glendale Sports Complex, Palo Verde, Perryville, White Tank Mountain Park, Luke AFB, Liberty, Phoenix International Raceway and Camelback Ranch. This includes the following highways... AZ Interstate 10 between mile markers 110 and 136. US Highway 60 between mile markers 148 and 150. AZ Route 101 between mile markers 2 and 11. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Buckeye, Avondale; North Phoenix, Glendale; Northwest Valley; Sonoran Desert Natl Monument; Tonopah Desert
